duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a collaborative effort to deliver scalable, highly available technical solutions to meet or exceed company goals.
Upgrade and maintain enterprise firewall, switching, wireless, edge, and virtual network infrastructure.
Expert in troubleshooting complex technical issues and pro-active monitoring of networking components.
Create, maintain, and validate network-related documentation, flows, and diagrams.
Active member of DevOps/Cloud Ops team, managing virtual network infrastructure with emphasis on infrastructure-as-code.
Base-level understanding of OS-level networking, including Windows, Linux, and appliances.
Excellent communication skills and ability to communicate professionally at all levels within the organization.
Measure and report on network uptime, infrastructure excellence, and DevOps excellence.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related discipline, or 2-year experience in the technology field.
